descriptor.name: Home Assistant entity
descriptor.description: Current state of an entity in Home Assistant

entityId.label: Entity ID
entityId.info: Unique entity ID in Home Assistant. Copy by clicking on entity > Click on cog icon > Click on copy button at 'Entity ID'. Some custom entities may not be supported.

appendUnit.label: Append unit of measurement
appendUnit.info: Append the unit of measurement attribute to the entity state.

automationId.label: Optional automation ID
automationId.info: Your unique automation ID. Always starts with automation.XXXXX. If not set, widget will not be clickable and only display state. After click, entity state will be refreshed.

displayFriendlyName.label: Display friendly name
displayFriendlyName.info: Display friendly name from Home Assistant instead instead of display name
